name: Accordion
help: Allows to add an Accordion element to any page of the store, with collapsible items. If no 'Title' or 'Description' are defined, it will only display the Accordion.

title.name: Title
title.help: Optional. Allows to add a title that will display before the accordion.

highlight_color.name: Highlight color
highlight_color.help: This color is for the button and the highlighted line color.
